Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 95th overall pick, by Boston (FBA) in 1973...
Traded from Boston (FBA) to Diablo on 1/31/1975 (Going to SHP: 3B T. Hodapp. Going to DIA: P G. Sibley, 1B L. Pellegrino, 2B A. Diaz)...
Injured on 9/5/1975 with a Bruised Jaw, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/12/1978, off Jon Hillhouse (PIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/29/1978, off Clyde Hall (SYR)...
Had 24-game hitting streak snapped on 5/2/1982...
Injured on 5/27/1983 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Syracuse on 7/14/1985...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against West Texas on 9/19/1986...
